description: Tommy came to L.A. to apply on a waiter job. This very special position required some nude dancing. It didn't take long for Tommy to show him his best moves and he surely had what it takes to entertain our guests. Trenton noticed how the new guy fucked his Fleshjack and took note to call him back to see how his large cock can actually fuck a guy for real. To be continued...
title: Naughty Job Interview 3, Scene #01
